name: The Tower Defence
description:
Play as the captain for the Tower Defence Division of the U.S Military and take on the robot invasion head on! This strategic game is all about managing economy and firepower.

There are 10 levels so far and a endless mode; each level is hand-crafted and tested. There are a few bugs, especially on 3X speed but overall this game runs well. As I've already mentioned this is my first ever game that I've uploaded so please give me feedback.
